column4: I am using Firefox 3.6.The thing is that it takes like 20 seconds to launch.I had the same issue since the initial OS install with firefox 3.5.Any ideas?
firefox is bloated. ubuntu's binary of firefox is bloated. you're probably not using an ssd. all these factor in to slow startup
i have to wait like 15 secs,that cant be right.I am launching Chrome 15 times faster :P
